short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto switches to RTL layout whenever you translate page to Persian, Arabic, or other RTL languages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension automatically switches page layout to right-to-left (RTL) whenever you translate page to Persian, Arabic, or other right-to-left languages using Chrome's built-in translation feature.

https://github.com/sir-kokabi/AutoRTL
